title: Ransom
description: Former military man Ransom Rockwell joined forces with his two best friends, becoming bounty hunters, and forming Gray Wolf Corp.Ransom is dedicated to hunting down the lawless and bringing them to justice.You run, he will find you.When Ransom isn't chasing a bounty, he's busy being a single father.He doesn't have time for distractions.All that changes when Genesis McKenna moves to town. His attraction for her is instant.She's wildly beautiful and strong.Making Genesis his becomes Ransom's mission.Her husband died nearly two years ago. Now Genesis McKenna is looking to start over.Packing up her two children and the only life she's ever known, Genesis moves to the small town of Graystone, Texas.A new town.A new life.Genesis is focused on healing her family and their future. The last thing she expected was to have Ransom Rockwell waltz into her life.He's a single father and ridiculously handsome.The attraction between them is intense.Genesis is torn between her feelings toward Ransom and the love she still has for her late husband. It doesn't take long for Ransom to break through her defenses and help piece together her broken heart. The men of Gray Wolf Corp take on a high-profile case. The new bounty sends them on the hunt for a known cold-blooded killer with a vendetta against the team.Tracking down the criminal and bringing him to justice becomes personal when the killer sets his sights on Genesis.
author: Crystal  Daniels
